name: Cowboy Bebop for Dreamcast
description:
Cowboy Bebop for Dreamcast

Fun game based on the mystical COWBOY BEBOP published by SUNRISE in 1995, but now in an unpublished version for the Sega Dreamcast console. 

It can also be played with the nullDC emulator version 1.04. You can download it from the itch.io store and you can study its source code with the book "Video game programming: for Dreamcast", written by Rolando Fernández Benavidez, distributed on Google Play Books.
